statements: DELETE FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 123 AND email = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM customer_data WHERE billing_amount > 1000 AND phone_number LIKE '%555%';
DELETE FROM billing_info WHERE billing_id = 100 AND payment_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 500 AND last_name = 'Smith';
DELETE FROM billing_info WHERE customer_id = 3 AND due_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM billing_info WHERE customer_id = 101 AND payment_method = 'Credit Card';
DELETE FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
